complaint.description: The customer made a purchase but the item was out of stock and they have been unable to get a refund for it.
complaint.suggestion: Resolve the refund issue and ensure timely and efficient refund process for customers.

meta.review_content:
I made a purchase on the Vodabucks Store on 24 July and paid via my credit card. The item was then out of stock and I have trying to get my refund since then.

Numerous calls later having spoken to amongst many others, Thabang and her supervisor Anastacia Ndlovu at Vodacom Rewards but to no avail.

Then there are times that you call Vodacom Customer Support and you hold for ages, then you get diverted without you requesting it, to the Bot who has no clue what you are talking about. The Bot then says that you will called back by an agent which never happens.

Trying to speak to Vodacom is the most frustrating thing. And they are supposed to be in communications??

Not sure if they just want to steal my money.

All because of this, I am going to cancel contracts with Vodacom. Imagine if I have a cellular related problem?? Will it also take 3 weeks without assistance.

I have no option but to maybe escalate to ICASA.
